It was a dark and stormy night. The scientist, Dr. Evilgenius, muttered to himself, "Soon, the world will be mine!" He cackled maniacally as he input the sequence into his world-domination machine:  .  The machine whirred, sparks flew, and a strange smell filled the air.  "Excellent!" he exclaimed. "The doom ray is almost ready... just needs some more coffee."  Or maybe a vacation.
